footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Lisa | Update Date: 08/25/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: Kagura's Verity

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Skyward Atlas, The Widsith

fields.name: Second Best Artifact Set:
fields.value: 15005,attack

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% |<goblet>  Electro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: ATK%|Energy Recharge|CRIT DMG|CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Lightning Rose
**2)** Elemental Skill: Violet Arc
**3)** Normal Attack: Lightning Touch

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: For a main on-field DPS build, all talents being raised as high as possible is recommended. Thundersoother is only the best if an Electro Aura is continuously maintained. This shouldn't be too difficult in most of Lisa's teams.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Lisa | Update Date: 08/04/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Prototype Amber, Hakushin Ring, Favonius Codex

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge % |<goblet>  Electro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge|CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Lightning Rose
**2)** Elemental Skill: Violet Arc
**3)** Normal Attack: Lightning Touch

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Talents do not have to be leveled, but she should be leveled up to have at least the 4th ascension passive which reduces enemy defence.
4-piece Instructor does not help in teams that do not require the Elemental Mastery
Offensive stats can be ignored, CRIT Rate needs to be decently high if using Favonius weapons.
Energy Recharge is needed.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Lisa | Update Date: 01/25/2023 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: Sacrificial Fragments

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Favonius Codex, Magic Guide, Mappa Mare, Hakushin Ring, Widsith, A Thousand Floating Dreams

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value:
<sands> Elemental Mastery
<goblet> Elemental Mastery
<circlet> Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Elemental Mastery|Energy Recharge

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value: Talent levels often do not matter for an EM carry Lisa, since she does not scale with EM for her combat talents. However, she does ascend with Elemental Mastery, so it is recommended to raise her as high as possible.
